subject: Attention Dear,
body:
Attention Dear,
 
The FedEx courier Company apologise for the delay of shipping your inheritance fund to you since and all the inconveniences and inflict that this company might have indulged you through.
FedEx courier head office is hereby passing an essential message to all our valuable customers to be very careful while presenting their receivers residential address to avoid wrong delivery and note that this company is mailing you today as per your Consignment that was brought to this company to be delivered to you by Your Business Partner and along with the delivery process, there came a misunderstanding between you and the (AIC) Insurance Company in regard of their request as per their insurance certificate which happens to be course of your Consignment box pending for the past years.
 
Meanwhile, we are hereby informing you that this Company has finalized everything with the Astanding Insurance company (AIC) as the company organization has also listed 24 valuable Consignments to be intact in this office after the released of the parcels from the Nikon Insurance Company.
 
We are happy to inform you once again that your Consignment box valued at sum of $5.800,000 (Five Million, Eight Hundred Thousand United State Dollars ) is among the 24 parcels listed, also with your name as the receiver despite that we lost your private residential address, which is an indication that you can now re-send your residential address back to this FedEx Company and your consignment box will be delivered to you without any hesitation with this e-mail (
fedexwexprerss@gmail.com
)
 
Be inform that this FedEx company has spent out of their incomes in the process of recovering back your consignment box, So dear customer we once again appreciate your patronage in our favor Without hesitations and
 you are to pay your consignment box delivery fee which is sum of $50.00 USD to This company via Apple Itunes Gift card
 to avoid any kind of delay so that your consignment box can be delivered to your residential address before it accumulate a demurrage after one week only, as you know your consignment box is not just an ordinary consignment box but with a huge amount of money and I think you understand what I mean by accumulating demurrages? Which you will not allow to happen to your recovered consignment box that was almost gone if not for the love that the good God has for every one of us.
 
We assure you that your Consignment will arrive in your country in two days time and it will get to your door step the second day as soon as this company receive the delivery fee and we operate in trust and loyalty in your favor And also the FedEx Courier Company, so be careful with their e-mails so that your
consignment box will not be in danger with their evil plans.
 
AWAITING TO READ YOUR E-MAIL WITH THE PAYMENT $50 APPLE ITUNES CARD AS INSTRUCTED AND REMEMBER THAT YOU ARE INSTRUCTED TO RECONFIRM YOUR PERSONAL DETAILS AGAIN TO AVOID OUR AGENT DELIVERING YOUR CONSIGNMENT BOX A TO WRONG PERSON/ADDRESS.
 
The airway bill of your consignment will be sent to you to enable you monitor your delivery until it gets delivered to you within 48 hours interval.
This is the code to be aware of to avoid misplacement of your consignment.
 
Registration Number.XXXXFCBR7777.
Consignment Tag Number.FFCCLBR1122333.
Consignment shippment number.5.
 
Thanks For Co-operation.
Mr.CHRIS MATHEW
FedEx COURIER MANAGING DIRECTOR.
Contact the fedEX customer care: EMAIL: (
fedexwexprerss@gmail.com
)

subject: Re: Attention Dear,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the update regarding the delay in shipping my fund.

Best wishes,
Jesse
